mapper.insert: insert into p_board_rpl(prno, pbno, pr_content, m_id) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{pbno}, #{pr_content}, #{m_id} )
mapper.update: update p_board_rpl set pr_content = #{pr_content}, pr_update = sysdate where prno = #{prno}
mapper.select: select count(prno) from p_board_rpl where pbno = #{pbno}
